translations: v.修复（repair 的 ing 形式）；修理

sentences.sentence: He was busily engaged repairing his bike.
sentences.translation: 他正忙着修他的自行车。

sentences.sentence: They were very worried about the cost of repairing the leaky roof.
sentences.translation: 他们非常担心维修漏雨屋顶的费用。

sentences.sentence: It was up to the US to take the initiative in repairing relations.
sentences.translation: 在修复关系方面应由美国采取主动。
